metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11766 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
dhcp6.c in dhcpcd before 6.11.7 and 7.x before 7.2.2 has a buffer over-read in the D6_OPTION_PD_EXCLUDE feature.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11766` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dhcpcd5 - 7.1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dhcpcd5 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.1.0-2').
